DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate whether the addition of whey protein to a breakfast high in carbohydrate content will influence acute metabolic and appetite responses, as well as responses to a subsequent lunch meal.
DOC.brief_title: Metabolic and Appetite Parameters Following Addition of Whey Protein to a Carbohydrate-based Breakfast
DOC.criteria: Aged 1840 years old (male) Recreationally active (>30 minutes of structured exercise, 5 times/week) Metabolic disease (e.g. Type 2 diabetes, thyroid disorders) Taking any prescribed medication Regular breakfast skipper Food allergies or intolerances Eating disorders Smoker
